text: @realDonaldTrump I hope Mr. President you do not sign that bill with all of the Democrats BS items in it, it’s supposed to be for coronavirus only not all that money that Pelosi wanted to put in it so please do not sign the bill veto it and let the country know why you’re vetoing the bill
